verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I know the Master of the wind
I know the Maker of the rain
He can calm the storm
Make the sun shine again
I know the Master of the wind

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My boat of life sails
On a troubled sea
Ever there's a wind in my sail
But I have a friend
Who watches over me
When the breeze turns into a gale

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sometimes I soar
Like an eagle to the sky
Among the peaks
My soul can be found
An unexpected storm
May drive me from the heights
Bring me low
But ne'er brings me down
